mapper.select: SELECT R.REPORT_NO , R.DIVISION , R.REPORT_MEMBER , R.STATUS , I.PROJECT_NO , P.PROJECT_NAME , I.ISSUE_NO , I.ISSUE_TYPE , I.ISSUE_TITLE , I.REGISTER_DATE , I.WORK_NO , W.WORK_NAME , I.REGISTER_TYPE , M1.MEMBER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME , I.TEAMWORKER , M2.MEMBER_NAME AS TEAMWORKER_NAME , I.ACTION_DATE , IH.IH_DATE , IH.STATUS AS HISTORY_DATE , NVL(IH.IH_CONTENT, '조치전') AS IH_CONTENT , R.P_STATUS FROM REPORT R JOIN ISSUE_HISTORY IH ON(R.DIVISION = IH.IH_NO) JOIN ISSUE I ON(IH.ISSUE_NO = I.ISSUE_NO) JOIN WORK W ON (I.WORK_NO = W.WORK_NO) JOIN PROJECT P ON (I.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK) JOIN MEMBER M1 ON (I.REGISTER_TYPE = M1.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (I.TEAMWORKER = M2.MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.REPORT_MEMBER = #{memberNo} ORDER BY IH.IH_DATE DESC
SELECT MEMBER_PK FROM PROJECT_TEAM WHERE PROJECT_PK = #{projectNo} AND ROLE IN ('PM', 'PSM')
